input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: THE CITY AND COMMUNE OF SEROCK. Summary: Providing Public Transport Services in the Area of ​​The City and Commune of Serock. Description: Pursuant to Art. 7 section 2 of Regulation (EC) No 1370/2007 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 23 October 2007 concerning public passenger transport services in the field of national and road passenger transport and repealing Council Regulation (EEC) No 1191/69 and (EEC) 1107/70 (OJ L315 of 3 December 2007, p. 1) and Art. 23 of the Act of December 16, 2010 on public collective transport (Journal of Laws of 2025, item 285), the Mayor of the City and Commune of Serock announces the intention to conduct the procedure for the provision of public transport services in the Serock commune. Determination of the network of communication lines on which transport will be carried out: Line 1: Serock Centrum - Dębe Fort - Zegrze Osiedle - Jadwisin - Ludwinowo Zegrze - Serock Centrum; Line 2: Serock Centrum - Ludwinowo Zegrze - Jadwisin - Zegrze Osiedle - Dębe Fort - Serock Centrum; Line 3: Line 4 (return) Serock Centrum - Kania Polska ul. Bindugi - Cupel - Gąsiorowo ul. Grunwaldzka - Wierzbica -Serock Centrum; Line 5: Serock Centrum - Dębe Fort - Zegrze Osiedle - PKP Legionowo; Line 6: Serock Centrum - Zegrze Osiedle - PKP Legionowo. Providing public transport services in the area of the City and Commune of Serock Doc Title: Provision of services in the field of public collective transport in the area of the City and Commune of Serock Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-12-24. Closing Date: 2026-02-07. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MINISTRY OF DIGITIZATION. Summary: Comprehensive Service of Preparing the Exhibition Stand of the Ministry of Digitization during the Mobile World Congress (Mwc) 2026 in Barcelona. Description: 1. The subject of the order is a comprehensive service consisting in the design, construction, assembly and disassembly of exhibition structures along with technical support of the stand during the international trade fair Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2026 in Barcelona. The detailed description of the subject of the order constitutes Annex No. 1 to the Specification, and the order will be implemented on the terms specified in the Draft Provisions of the contract constituting Annex No. 2 to the Specification. 2. The Ordering Party provides for the possibility invalidation of the contract award procedure if the public funds that the contracting authority intended to use to finance all or part of the contract were not awarded (in accordance with Article 257 of the Public Procurement Act). 3. The Ordering Party, in accordance with Art. 222 paragraph 4 of the Public Procurement Act specifies the amount it intends to allocate to finance the order, i.e. PLN 1,500,600.00 gross. 4. DATE OF THE FAIR: March 2 - 5, 2026 (Monday - Thursday), from 08:00 to 19:00. 5. The offer must include the document referred to in Chapter XV of the SWZ, i.e.: Concept and visualization of the development of the exhibition space, if the Contractor applies for points in the evaluation criterion. 6. Deadline for completing the order: from the date of signing the contract to March 15, 2026, and taking into account the deadlines referred to in the Draft Provisions of the Agreement constituting Annex No. 2 to the SWZ. Comprehensive service of preparing the exhibition stand of the Ministry of Digitization during the Mobile World Congress.... Published Date: 2025-12-24. Closing Date: 2026-01-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Educational trips to educational centers such as the Copernicus Science Center in Warsaw and to the Science and Technology Center in Łódź as part of programming and robotics classes, the scope of which includes the organization of three one-day trips/trips for 112 participants (students) and 10 teachers (guardians) in each trip/trip, in particular: preparation of a detailed program departure in accordance with the description of the subject of the order and in agreement with the Ordering Party; providing entry tickets in the number and type enabling the implementation of the trip program; covering the costs of entry to the Copernicus Science Center in Warsaw and the Science and Technology Center in Warsaw Łódź, their sightseeing and educational workshops; providing a person supervising the organization of the trip and the implementation of the substantive guide/pilot program; providing food for trip participants (lunch); providing transport for trip participants (coach or bus); participants' personal accident insurance.. Published Date: 2025-12-24. Closing Date: 2026-01-05. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: 3RD REGIONAL LOGISTICS BASE, FACULTY OF AVIATION TECHNOLOGY. Summary: Delivery of the P70Ta000A03-801 Engine Starter for M-346 Aircraft. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the supply of aircraft ground support equipment (NOSP) - 1 piece of the P70TA000A03-801 engine starter for M-346 aircraft, hereinafter also referred to as the "product". 2. The delivered product must be new, from current production, i.e. from the year delivery or the year preceding delivery, must be complete and technically efficient and must meet the quality requirements of the standards and requirements included in the manufacturer's current technical documentation in force on the date of signing the contract. 3. Together with the product The contractor will provide the technical documentation referred to in § 8 of the draft provisions of the contract constituting Annex No. 1 to the SWZ. The Contractor will grant an indefinite license for the provided technical documentation with a notice period of not less than 25 years, within the scope and in the fields of use specified in § 8 of the Draft Provisions of the Agreement. 4. The ordering party described the subject of the order by indicating the origin (manufacturer and type of engine starter) without the possibility of admitting products equivalent to reason: - the device is dedicated to starting the engine of the M-346 aircraft and is included in the technical documentation of the above-mentioned aircraft; - the technical documentation of the M-346 aircraft does not provide for the use of an engine starter other than the one indicated in proceedings; - the use of a replacement engine starter for the M-346 aircraft that has not been approved by the manufacturer may pose a threat to the life or health of persons involved in the operation of the above-mentioned aircraft. aircraft.... Published Date: 2025-12-23. Closing Date: 2026-01-22. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The subject of the Order is the supply of electrical equipment for Metropolis 98B vehicles (hereinafter also referred to as "parts"), divided into 15 tasks. 2. The scope of the Subject of the Order includes the supply of electrical equipment as part of individual tasks indicated in the "List of electrical accessories for Metropolis 98-B vehicles and delivery schedule 2026 - 2027" constituting Annex No. 1 to the Technical Specification, constituting Annex No. 1 to the SWZ and constituting its integral part (hereinafter referred to as "ST"). 3. The Ordering Party requires the implementation of the Subject of the Order as part of partial deliveries according to the delivery schedule and in the quantities indicated in Annex 1 to the ST. Within one batch indicated in the above-mentioned partial deliveries are not allowed in the schedule. 4. The delivered Subject of the Order must be brand new, unused (brand new, unused means spare parts originally packed, showing no traces of use). 5. The Contractor will provide a 24-month warranty for the delivered parts conditions indicated in the contract template (Annex No. 2 to the SWZ). During the period equal to the period of the warranty granted by the Contractor, the Subject of the Order will be covered by warranty for defects. 6. The Subject of the Order will be completed in accordance with the documentation proceedings, i.e. this SWZ and its annexes, in particular the ST and the contract template. 7. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: PUBLIC TRANSPORT AUTHORITY IN WARSAW, ACTING ON THE BASIS OF GRANTED POWERS OF ATTORNEY ON BEHALF OF AND FOR THE BENEFIT OF THE CAPITAL CITY OF WARSAW. Summary: Regular Passenger Transport Services Provided as Part of Public Transport on Bus Lines Supervised by Ztm on the Entire Transport Network Provided by Buses with a Length of Approx. 12 M. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the provision of regular transport services provided as part of local public transport (public transport in Warsaw) on lines supervised by the Public Transport Authority, throughout the entire area of ​​the transport system. i.e. in the capital city area Warsaw and communes near Warsaw, with which the capital city Warsaw signed appropriate agreements. 2. The subject of the order are transport services provided for a period of 10 years (120 months) in an annual quantity of PLN 4,200,000 (four million two hundred thousand) with a tolerance of up to -10% (minus ten percent) of vehicle kilometers when using 50 buses with a length of approx. 12 meters (MAXI class) and ensuring min. 4 reserve vehicles. In the event of commencement and/or termination of the provision of services in during the year, this amount will be reduced in proportion to the number of months and days remaining until the end of the calendar year. 3. A detailed description of the subject of the order is included in Chapter VI of the SWZ and the contract template with attachments, constituting Annex No. 6 to SWZ. 4. The Ordering Party provides for the possibility of awarding contracts referred to in Art. 388 point 2 letter c) Public Procurement Law. Published Date: 2025-12-23. Closing Date: 2026-01-26. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: Delivery of Tires for Company Cars for the Needs of the Provincial Police Headquarters in Lublin and its Subordinate Units. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the supply of brand new tires for company cars for the needs of the Provincial Police Headquarters in Lublin and its subordinate units. 2. The detailed scope of deliveries (description of the subject of the order) is specified in attachments: 1)1) No. 1.1 to SWZ - package No. 1 - supply of winter tires for passenger cars and SUVs; 2) No. 1.2 to SWZ - package No. 2 - supply of summer tires for passenger cars and SUVs; 3) No. 1.3 to SWZ - package No. 3 - delivery of summer tires to delivery vehicles and trucks; 4) No. 1.4 to SWZ - package No. 4 - supply of tires for BMW cars; and in the contract template. 3. Postulated requirements for contractors: 1) The ordering party requires the tires to be delivered with the production date no earlier than the 12th months from the date of their delivery to the Ordering Party; 2) The Ordering Party requires that the offered and delivered tires have a marking confirming compliance with all safety standards (DOT symbol or equivalent in terms of date tire production) and a sticker - tire label in accordance with Regulation (EU) No. 2020/740 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 25/05/2020 on the labeling of tires in terms of fuel efficiency and other essential parameters, amending Regulation (EU) 2017/1369 and repealing Regulation (EC) No 1222/2009 (does not apply to tires placed on the market before the date of application of this Regulation - then Regulation ... applies).. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: JANIKOWO COMMUNE. Summary: Development of the Selective Municipal Waste Collection System in the Janikowo Commune. Description: The subject of the order includes the implementation of the task entitled: "Development of the Selective Municipal Waste Collection system in the Janikowo Commune". The scope of the order includes the delivery and implementation of the Selective Municipal Waste Collection System in the commune. Janikowo, consisting in the delivery and installation of 5 machines for waste segregation. The location at specific points in the Wilkoński estate in Janikowo is intended to facilitate access and convenience for residents to dispose of sorted waste, and thus thus encouraging them even more to care for the environment. The scope of the order also includes the construction of a composting plant for biodegradable green waste and a reloading point for separated waste, delivery and installation of a truck scale with a container. office space and construction works consisting in hardening the area in accordance with the design documentation and bill of quantities. These documents (design documentation and bill of quantities) complement each other. The bill of quantities provided applies only to works related to construction of a composting plant. The hardening of the area in the bill of quantities does not take into account the hardening of the area for waste disposal machines. The delivery and installation of machines should be priced based on the description of the subject of the order. Within In order to complete the above task, two sets of boats must be made, delivered and launched, consisting of two boats connected together, made on the basis of a design owned by the Ordering Party, approved by the Polish Register of Shipping S.A. constituting Attachment No. 1 to the description of the subject of the order, including the delivery and installation of the boat recovery system in the designated location in accordance with the project constituting Attachment No. 2. As part of the implementation of the above task, all costs should also be calculated materials necessary to complete the electrical installation to power the battery charging system located on board the boats in question and the boat steering system in the port. A vision is possible to prepare the offer local under the conditions set out in the SWZ. A detailed description of the subject of the order is included in Annex No. 2 to the SWZ with attachments. Doc Title: Construction and delivery of two sets of boats and their retrieval system for the MGW in Zabrze Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-12-23. Closing Date: 2026-02-02. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The organizer will commission the implementation in accordance with Art. 22 section 1 point 1 of the Act of 16 December 2010 on public public transport, provision of transport services in the field of bus transport public utilities in the district Konin and the city of Konin. The Operator is entitled to remuneration under this contract only including the subsidy from the Public Utility Bus Transport Development Fund. Provision of transportation services public utility buses based on art. 22 section 1 point 1 of the PTZ Act The organizer will commission the implementation in accordance with Art. 22 section 1 point 1 of the Act of 16 December 2010 on public public transport, provision of transport services in scope of bus transport of a nature public utilities in 2025 in accordance with established timetables within the administrative boundaries of the Konin County and the City Horse meat. The Operator is entitled to remuneration under this agreement only taking into account the surcharge from the funds of the Public Bus Transport Development Fund. Doc Title: Provision of public utility bus transport services based on art.22 section 1 point 1 Act on PTZ Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-02-05. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

As part of the service, the Contractor will provide: (A) materials educational: art, office and toys; (B) graphic design and printing of materials, and (C) packaging of educational materials and printouts into "educational packages" and their delivery to the 115th OWP. Educational packages will serve OWP teachers until conducting 4 cycles of classes (so-called Bofka missions), one mission in each of the 4 competence groups: (1) language and culture, (2) modern technologies, (3) healthy development, (4) entrepreneurship - 8 classes in each mission (Cultural Mission, Technological Mission, Mission Ecological and Business Mission) - a total of 32 classes. The "educational package" (1,460 pieces) should be understood as a "classroom package" (1,000 pieces) and a "kindergarten package" (460 pieces) packed in a resealable cardboard box and opening during 8 activities carried out during one mission and storing them in stacks of at least 5 boxes. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: COMMUNE OF THE CITY OF GDAŃSK. Summary: Providing a Comprehensive Service in the Field of Reservation, Sale and Delivery of Airline Tickets on Domestic and Foreign Routes. Description: The subject of the order is the provision of a comprehensive service in the field of searching for the most advantageous flights in terms of price and time (hours), their reservation, sale and delivery of airline tickets, including tickets from low-cost carriers and related services, including: mediation in contacts with carriers in the field of loyalty programs, complaints, reservation changes, etc., in accordance with the needs of the Ordering Party. The order concerns the purchase of economy class tickets and with the FLEX option. Scope of the order covers domestic passenger transport and foreign passenger transport, on European sections (to/from European countries) and intercontinental sections outside Europe - provided by regular airlines and domestic transport. The Ordering Party reserves the right purchase of low-cost airline tickets for foreign flights, but only at the express request of the Ordering Party. Ticket reservations will be made depending on the actual needs of the Ordering Party.. Published Date: 2025-12-20. Closing Date: 2026-01-14. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: KOLUSZKI COMMUNE. Summary: Collection and Management of Municipal Waste from Property Owners Living in the Koluszki Commune. Description: The subject of the contract is the provision of services consisting in the collection and management of separately collected municipal waste and mixed waste from real estate where residents live and from real estate where there are: cottages holiday homes or other properties used for recreational purposes, used only for part of the year. Approximate amounts of individual types of waste are included in the unit price form constituting Annex 2 to the Specification Order Terms. The total estimated amount of waste is: 19,010 Mg. The detailed scope of the order includes: 1) Collection and management of municipal waste from inhabited properties according to the implementation schedule, 2) Collection and management of waste from PSZOK in Koluszki, 3) Preparing monthly reports to monitor the services provided and inform the Ordering Party about any: problems and irregularities noticed during the provision of municipal waste collection services, 4) Preparing and submitting annual reports to the Ordering Party in accordance with Chapter 4b of the Act of September 13, 1996 on maintaining cleanliness and order in municipalities (consolidated text: Journal of Laws of 2023, item 1469). Place of implementation: the entire area of ​​the Koluszki Commune the following towns: Koluszki, Będzelin, Borowa, Długie, Erazmów, Felicjanów, Gałków Duży, Gałków Mały, Gałkówek Parcela, Jeziorko, Kazdrowien, Katarzynów, Kazimierzów, Koluszki, Leosin, Lisowice, Now.... Published Date: 2025-12-19. Closing Date: 2026-01-05. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: BIERZWNIK COMMUNE. Summary: "Transportation of Students on Communication Lines of the Bierzwnik Commune and Neighboring Communes to Schools and Transport of Disabled Students to Special Institutions". Description: Part I - transport of students from the Bierzwnik commune to the School and Kindergarten Complex. Heritage of the Bierzwnica Cistercians in Bierzwnik in 2026. Providing a service in open regular bus transport, consisting in transporting children to the School Complex Kindergarten in Bierzwnik, on communication lines established by the Contractor. The Ordering Party requires that communication lines be designated in a way that allows students to travel (on the bus) as short as possible. Airlines must provide delivery and pickup stops in individual towns to the School and Kindergarten Complex in Bierzwnik and back on all school days, in accordance with the calendar of the school year 2025/2026 (January - June 2026) and 2026/2027 (September - December 2026). Deadline the provision of transport services is established for the duration of the contract, i.e. from the date of conclusion of the contract to December 31, 2026. A detailed description of the subject of the order, including technical requirements, obligations of the Contractor and terms of the order is described in Annex No. 2 SWZ (OPZ). Part I: delivery of an agricultural tractor, a weeder for inter-row cultivation, a field sprayer, an orchard sprayer and fertilizer spreader The description of the subject of the contract is included in the SWZ and SOPZ. Part II: delivery of a reconnaissance drone and an execution drone. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: POMERANIAN TEACHER EDUCATION CENTER IN GDAŃSK. Summary: Comprehensive Organization of a National Study Visit. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the comprehensive organization of a national study visit to the Greater Poland Voivodeship for a group of approximately 30 participants, including career advisors and employees of institutions involved in activities in the field of career counseling and coordination of regional educational activities. 2. The order includes in particular: 1) providing bus transport on the Gdańsk - Greater Poland Voivodeship - Gdańsk route, including local transport services, 2)reservation and provision of accommodation for two nights in a hotel with a minimum three-star standard, 3) provision of full board including breakfasts, lunches, dinners, coffee breaks and an official dinner, 4) organizing a substantive program of the visit covering at least four meetings study in institutions operating in the field of career counseling, 5) preparation of the cultural and cognitive part consistent with the topic of the visit, 6) insurance of participants regarding the consequences of accidents and medical costs, 7) assurance a coordinator responsible for the course of the visit and ongoing contact with the Ordering Party. 3.The visit is planned for March 2026 and will last three days, from Wednesday to Friday. 4. The detailed program and schedule will be agreed between the Ordering Party and the contractor within 14 business days from the date of signing the contract. 5. A detailed description of the subject of the order is attached as Appendix No. 1 to the SWZ. 6. The Ordering Party does not allow the submission of partial offers. 7.The contractor may entrust.... input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: ŚWIĘTOKRZYSKIE CENTER FOR MEDICAL RESCUE AND SANITARY TRANSPORT IN KIELCE. Summary: Deliveries of Spare Parts for Mercedes-Benz and Volkswagen Cars over a Period of 2 Years. Description: The subject of the order is the successive deliveries of spare parts for Mercedes-Benz and Volkswagen cars over a period of 2 years. including: Task No. 1 - Deliveries of spare parts for Mercedes-Benz cars Detailed list of parts with numbers catalog numbers and quantities are included in Annex No. 6a to the SWZ. Task No. 2 - Delivery of spare parts for Volkswagen cars A detailed list of parts with catalog numbers and quantities is included in Annex No. 6b to the SWZ. Parts delivery spare parts in quality "O" and "Q" according to the GVO classification, i.e. "O" - A part manufactured or approved by the vehicle manufacturer and sold under its brand and logo. "Q" - Part manufactured by the same manufacturer that supplies parts to first assembly to the factory, but sold under the brand of the parts manufacturer, not the car brand. The Contractor will provide the Ordering Party with a computer program for selecting parts for Mercedes-Benz (Task No. 1) and Volkswagen (Task No. 2) cars or will provide access to using such an application via a web browser from the date the contract enters into force. Doc Title: Supplies of spare parts for Mercedes-Benz and Volkswagen cars over a period of 2 years Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2026-01-21. Competition: ICB. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MUNICIPAL ROAD AND COMMUNICATION AUTHORITY IN RADOM. Summary: Design, Construction and Launch of the Intelligent Transport System in Radom (Hereinafter Referred to as the "Its System") in Connection with the Implementation of the Project Entitled: "Development of Urban Mobility Infrastructure.... Description: Design, construction and launch of the Intelligent Transport System in Radom (hereinafter referred to as the "ITS System") in connection with the implementation of the project entitled: "Development of urban mobility infrastructure... The subject of the order is design, construction and launch of the Intelligent Transport System in Radom (hereinafter referred to as the "ITS System") in connection with the implementation of the project entitled: "Development of urban mobility infrastructure in the Radom Functional Area - stages I and II". The order is being processed is in the "design and build" mode, so it consists of two basic stages: the design stage and the implementation stage. The order includes the design, installation and commissioning of the ITS system and the reconstruction of selected geometries intersections. The order includes: - reconstruction and construction of traffic lights at 39 intersections and pedestrian crossings, - adaptation of traffic lights at 39 intersections and pedestrian crossings to work in the ITS system, - implementation on the 39th intersections and pedestrian crossings equipped with traffic lights, priority for public transport, - delivery and launch of an IT application integrating ITS subsystems, - reconstruction of the geometry of intersections, - Center equipment Traffic Control and server room, - implementation of a data transmission network, - delivery of electric vehicles. The subject of the order was specified in detail in the Description of the Subject Matter of the Order (OPZ) - Annex No. 11 to the SWZ and the Functional and Utility Program (FFU). constituting Annex No. 6 to the OPZ. The vehicle is adapted for use in atmospheric conditions occurring in Poland. Vehicle adapted to outdoor storage. The vehicle is built and equipped in accordance with the provisions of the Act of June 20, 1997 - "Road Traffic Law" (Journal of Laws of 2024, item 1251, as amended), together with the implementing provisions to the Act, and the requirements contained in Regulation of the Minister of Infrastructure of December 31, 2002 on the technical conditions of vehicles and the scope of their necessary equipment (Journal of Laws of 2024, item 502, as amended). The vehicle must meet the requirements regarding privileges and markings Regulation of the Minister of Infrastructure of December 24, 2019 (Journal of Laws of 2024, item 502, as amended) on the technical conditions of vehicles and the scope of their necessary equipment. On the day of actual collection, the vehicle must have a complete set of documents enabling the vehicle to be registered in the Transport Department as a special trailer. The vehicle and its bodywork should meet the requirements set out in the Regulation of the Minister of Internal Affairs and Administration of June 20, 2007 on the list of products intended to ensure the principles of public safety or protection of health, life and property, as well as the rules for issuing approvals for these products for use (Journal of Laws of 2007, No. 143, item 1002, as amended), as well as the possession.... input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: CENTRAL MINING INSTITUTE - NATIONAL RESEARCH INSTITUTE. Summary: Transport Service of Samples for Testing for the Central Mining Institute of the National Research Institute.. Description: The subject of the order is the service of collecting coal and air samples from the mine and transporting them to the Ordering Party's headquarters. The Ordering Party expects that the service will be performed every day (Monday - Friday), usually between 4.00 a.m. and 10.00 a.m. The estimated route is: 150-250 km/day. In order to calculate the value of the order, the Ordering Party assumes an average value of kilometers traveled of 200 km/day and 250 working days per year. Transported air samples will be packed in 3-liter bags. The maximum volume of one transport is 200 l. Air samples will be transported 5 times a week. Coal samples are packed in bags weighing up to 10 kg, transported 1-2 times a week, a maximum of 3 samples at a time. Approximate waiting time at the mine for loading is approximately 15 minutes. Contractor Each time after receiving an order, it will present the route for approval along with approximate service hours. The place of commencement of the provision of services should be the registered office of the Ordering Party (Katowice, Plac Gwarkw 1). input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: MASZEWO COMMUNE. Summary: Providing Transportation and Pick-Up Services for Disabled Students from the Maszewo Commune to Educational Institutions in Goleniów, Przybiernów, nowogard and Radów Wielki, Along with Providing Care. Description: The subject of the order is the provision of transportation and pick-up services for disabled children and students from the Maszewo commune to educational facilities in Goleniów, Przybiernów, Nowogardzkie and Radów Wielki, together with the provision of care in irregular transport, excluding holiday period in the 2025/2026 school year. Transport will be provided only for students on the basis of monthly tickets. Students will be transported from Monday to Friday every week, on school days, in accordance with the regulation of the Minister of Education National School of August 11, 2017 on the organization of the school year (Journal of Laws, item 1603, as amended). Transport will be carried out by buses on routes appropriate for a given school, specified in the list in SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-12-11. Closing Date: 2025-12-19. Competition: ICB. Description: The subject of the order is the provision of transport and pick-up services for disabled children and students from the Maszewo commune to educational facilities in Goleniow, Przybiernow, Nowogardskie and Radow Wielki, together with the provision of care in irregular transport, excluding the holiday period during the school year. 2025/2026. Transport will be provided only for students on the basis of monthly tickets. Students will be transported from Monday to Friday every week, on school days, in accordance with the Regulation of the Minister of National Education of August 11, 2017 on the organization of the school year (Journal of Laws Laws item 1603, as amended). Transport will be carried out by buses on the routes appropriate for a given School, specified in the list in the SWZ.. Published Date: 2025-12-10. Closing Date: 2025-12-18. Competition: ICB. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: RAJCZA COMMUNE. Summary: "Purchase and Delivery of a Slurry Set: a 4X4 Tractor with a Slurry Barrel for the Sewage Network.. Description: 1. The subject of the order is the purchase and delivery of a septic system: a 4x4 tractor with a septic tank for the sewage system in order to provide a compatible set for septic works and to enable access to properties located in hard-to-reach places in the area. Rajcza commune.2. The equipment must be brand new, unregistered, unused, undamaged and not exhibited at exhibitions. The equipment requirements and technical conditions of the subject of the order are specified in detail in Annex No. 1B to SWZ.3. The contractor is obliged to deliver the above equipment to the site indicated by the Ordering Party.4. The ordering party does not divide the subject of the order into parts due to the fact that both the tractor and the slurry barrel are to constitute a functional set, the separation of which would be pointless or risky. The tractor and the slurry tanker are intended for shared use the barrel requires an appropriate tractor to handle it, if divided into parts it could result in a situation where the tractor and barrel will not cooperate with each other (e.g. different hitch systems, insufficient hydraulic power, etc.). input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: BRZEG DOLNY COMMUNE. Summary: Providing a Transport Service for Disabled Students to the Complex of Special Schools and Educational Institutions in Wołow in the Period from January 1 to June 26, 2026.. Description: The subject of the order (transport) includes: a) transport of children from their place of residence to ZSSiPO; b) transport of children from ZSSiPO to their place of residence (return transport); c) care during transport, i.e. providing a guardian ensuring safety and hygiene conditions during boarding, disembarking and traveling children by bus. Transport will be provided on all school days specified by the Minister of National Education and on the days of making up schoolwork, and for non-vacation units also during winter breaks and Christmas breaks (non-ferral units should be understood as children covered by the annual compulsory preschool education) organized in schools and working days off at times adjusted to the start and end times of classes at the facility. The estimated number of days of service implementation is 109 days. The order fulfillment period may change if it is determined on the basis of applicable regulations a different date for the duration of teaching and educational classes, or the classes will be limited or suspended. Closing Date: 2025-12-16. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Description: The subject of the order is the delivery, assembly and commissioning of new machines and devices equipped with agriculture 4.0 solutions for the production of basic agricultural products in accordance with the requirements of Annex 1 to the SWZ - description of the subject of the order for parts I and II of the order.<br> 1.Part I of the order delivery of the tractor with equipment:<br> 1) Agricultural tractor with RTK and ISOBUS automatic guidance system with a telematics gateway enabling data exchange.<br> 2) Precision seeder with fertilization, operating on the basis of cooperation with an ISOBUS tractor, with the function of variable dosing of the standard sowing based on soil fertility maps, 6 rows.<br> 3) Variable chamber baler operating based on cooperation with an ISOBUS tractor with the possibility of exchanging data with the farm management program.<br> 4) Trailed sprayer, capacity 3500 - 4000 l with section control and variable system dosage.<br> 5) Lime spreader, capacity 5000 - 6000 l with section control and variable dosage system.<br> 6) Satellite guidance system for your combine harvester, enabling two-way data exchange, and a yield and humidity sensor with a farm management system with 3 a year-long license for the yield monitoring platform.<br> 7) RTK base station with installation.<br> 8) A laptop used to operate the implemented machines and devices agriculture 4.0 solutions with a mass capacity of min. 1TB SSD.<br> 9) Farm management software.<br> The equipment provided above must to be early...

Approximate quantities of individual types of waste are included in the unit price form constituting Annex No. 2 to the Terms of Reference. Shared The Contractor's vehicles, owned by the Ordering Party, will be used on the basis of a separate paid contract. Description: Purchase of a mini excavator on tracks as part of the budget task entitled: purchase of a backhoe loader with the procedure number ZP.271.10.2025. input: Country: Poland. Purchaser Name: RYGLICE COMMUNE. Summary: Transport of Children from the Ryglice Commune to Schools and Kindergartens, Cz. i - Iii. Description: The subject of the order is to provide transport services for children from the Ryglice commune to schools and kindergartens: Part I: Transport children from the town of Kowalowa to the Primary School in Kowalowa, the town of Ryglice to the Primary School in Ryglice and the Public Kindergarten in Ryglice. Using the term school The ordering party also means kindergartens. The scope of the order includes the delivery and pick-up of children, every day from Monday to Friday, except for school holidays. The Ordering Party anticipates 186 days of transport and pick-up of children, but assumes that the number of these days may change due to the occurrence of exceptional situation beyond the control of the Ordering Party. In the event of completing school work on another day free from classes, transportation will be provided by the Contractor upon the prior notice of the Ordering Party at least 7 days. The Contractor provides transport in accordance with the route and timetable established by the Ordering Party and developed together with the principal of a given school and adapted to the lesson plan of students using the transport.
